name: Evaluation Trigger
semantic_context: Run a test dataset through your workflow to check performance
natural_language_description: 这是 Evaluation Trigger 节点。主要用于: Run a test dataset through your workflow to check performance

source.name: source
source.description: Where to get the test dataset from
source.natural_language_description: 参数名: Source | 作用: Where to get the test dataset from | 默认值: googleSheets
available_options: Data table (值: dataTable) - Load the test dataset from a local Data table
Google Sheets (值: googleSheets) - Load the test dataset from a Google Sheets document

notice.displayName: Pulls a test dataset from a Google Sheet. The workflow will run once for each row, in sequence. Tips for wiring this node up here.
notice.name: notice
notice.natural_language_description: 参数名: Pulls a test dataset from a Google Sheet. The workflow will run once for each row, in sequence. Tips for wiring this node up here.

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: oAuth2

documentId.name: documentId
documentId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Document Containing Dataset | 提示: Example dataset format here | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

sheetName.name: sheetName
sheetName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Sheet Containing Dataset | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

dataTableId.name: dataTableId
dataTableId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Data table | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

limitRows.name: limitRows
limitRows.description: Whether to limit number of rows to process
limitRows.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit Rows | 作用: Whether to limit number of rows to process | 默认值: False

maxRows.name: maxRows
maxRows.description: Maximum number of rows to process
maxRows.natural_language_description: 参数名: Max Rows to Process | 作用: Maximum number of rows to process | 默认值: 10

filtersUI.name: filtersUI
filtersUI.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}

filterRows.name: filterRows
filterRows.description: Whether to filter rows to process
filterRows.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filter Rows | 作用: Whether to filter rows to process | 默认值: False

matchType.name: matchType
matchType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Must Match | 默认值: anyCondition

filters.name: filters
filters.description: Filter to decide which rows get
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Conditions | 作用: Filter to decide which rows get | 默认值: {}
